התגליות הללו בשנת 2024 יכולות להיות פורצות דרך - אם הן נכונות https://www.sciencenews.org/article/2024-science-discoveries-could-be-trueMaria Temming Fri, 13 Dec 2024 20:00:00 +0000Space https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147311 Did microbes ever live on Mars? Did an "elevator" help build Egypt’s first pyramid? Some signs pointed to yes this year, but confirmation is still needed. 3147311
בדיקת סרטן והפסקת עישון הצילו כמעט 6 מיליון חיים https://www.sciencenews.org/article/cancer-screening-save-6-million-livesTina Hesman Saey Fri, 13 Dec 2024 18:00:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147336 Prevention, screening and treatment advances combined stopped 5.94 million deaths from cancer in the United States from 1975 through 2020. 3147336
בני אדם קישרו רגשות לאותם חלקי גוף במשך 3,000 שנה https://www.sciencenews.org/article/link-emotions-body-parts-3000-yearsJason Bittel Fri, 13 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000Anthropology https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147363 3,000-year-old clay tablets show that some associations between emotion and parts of the body have remained the same for millennia. 3147363

הרובר Perseverance של נאס"א מצא תפאורה פוטנציאלית חדשה לחיי מאדים https://www.sciencenews.org/article/nasa-perseverance-rover-potential-life-settingNikk Ogasa Thu, 12 Dec 2024 22:39:47 +0000Planetary Science https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147532 Now atop Jezero Crater, the robotic explorer found quartz indicative of habitable environments and possibly the oldest rocks yet seen in the solar system. 3147532
ה'בלוב', גל חום ימי חסר תקדים, הרג 4 מיליון עופות ים https://www.sciencenews.org/article/blob-marine-heat-wave-killed-seabirdsJake Buehler Thu, 12 Dec 2024 19:04:55 +0000Life https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147521 Millions of other animals may have perished too, suggesting the die-off event might be one of the worst in modern times. 3147521
